title: Data-Driven Mathematics Essay Education Utilizing Corpus Linguistics and Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic math terminology and fundamental digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Process recording analysis of mathematical problem-solving and AI feedback utilization in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners visualize mathematical problem-solving process data using corpus analysis tools to identify over 80% of logical errors.
After drafting mathematical essays using generative AI tools, learners achieve over 75% accuracy in incorporating feedback.
Explain data-driven decision-making processes in three or more stages according to a digital literacy assessment rubric.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
